dcterms:description: The BraTS 2021 challenge dataset comprises magnetic resonance (MR) imaging from four sequences: T1, post-contrast T1-weighted (T1Gd), T2-weighted (T2), and T2 Fluid Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR) for each patient. The data has already been co-registered, skull-stripped, and interpolated to the same resolution, with pixel-level annotations for lesions.
dcterms:title: BraTS 2021 challenge
